profile.name: Kent C. Dodds
profile.bio: Improving 🌎 with quality software. Husband, 5x Dad, Latter-day Saint. Dev Educator, MVP. Creator of @EpicWebDev & @EpicReactDev. Exploring #React, #AI. Learn in public! 🚀

tweets.content: Just pushed a massive update to the 'Data Fetching Patterns' module on EpicWeb.dev! We're diving deep into Remix loaders, server components, and client-side strategies. So much goodness to unpack! 🚀 #EpicWeb #RemixRun

The argument against `strict` mode in TypeScript often boils down to 'it's too much work.' But that 'work' is exactly where you catch bugs and solidify your understanding. Pay the tax upfront, save huge later. #TypeScript
Just spent 30 minutes debugging an issue only to realize I had a typo in an environment variable name. It's not a bug, it's a feature... of my personal error log. 🤦‍♂️ #DebuggingLife

Huge thanks to @community_member for their recent PR to `some-utility-library`! Open source thrives on these contributions. Remember, every little bit helps improve the ecosystem for everyone. Keep building! ✨ #OpenSource

Had a great time chatting with the team at [Fictional Company] about building resilient React apps yesterday. Always energizing to share knowledge and learn from others' perspectives. Grateful for opportunities to connect! 🙏

The React ecosystem moves fast, but the core principles of component composition and state management remain timeless. Don't chase every shiny new thing; master the fundamentals, then explore. #React #WebDev

It's incredible to see how many people are using EpicWeb.dev and EpicReact.dev to grow their skills. Witnessing your 'aha!' moments is the greatest reward. Thank you for being on this journey with me! 🙏

Today's reminder: 'We can lift ourselves and others by living a consecrated life.' - Elder Ulisses Soares. Simple, powerful truth that resonates in all aspects of life. Happy Sunday, friends. #LDS #SundayThoughts

Curious about how AI can genuinely boost your dev workflow, not just generate boilerplate? My new material on EpicAI.pro covers practical, hands-on strategies. Stop guessing, start building smarter! 💡 #EpicAI #AIforDevs

If your testing strategy doesn't actively help you refactor with confidence, it's not a *good* testing strategy. It's just busywork. Focus on integration tests that mimic user behavior. #Testing #DevX

One of the best ways to learn a new concept? Teach it. Even if it's just explaining it to your rubber duck. Articulating your understanding reveals gaps and solidifies knowledge. Try it! #DevEducation
Early morning coding session before the house wakes up. There's a special kind of peace in these hours. Prioritizing family time means finding these pockets of focus. 👨‍💻❤️ #WorkLifeBalance #Dad
My kids asked me what I do for work. I told them I spend all day explaining things to a really stubborn computer. They nodded. They get it. 😂 #DevLife #DadJokes

Stop copy-pasting code without understanding it. Seriously. It's a technical debt generator, not a productivity hack. Invest 5 minutes to learn, save 5 hours debugging later. #CodeQuality #BestPractices

Working on some fresh exercises for EpicReact.dev that challenge common assumptions about hooks and state. Get ready to level up your mental model! Who's excited for advanced patterns? ✨ #EpicReact #ReactHooks

Saw the latest dev tool leveraging AI for code suggestions. While impressive, it reinforces the need for strong fundamentals. AI augments, it doesn't replace understanding *why* your code works. Still, very cool! #AI #DevTools

Think about contributing to open source, but feel intimidated? Start small! Fix a typo, update docs, or even just open a thoughtful issue. Every interaction makes the project better. Your input matters! #OpenSource #Community

Me: *writes 100 lines of complex logic*
My compiler: 'Expected ;'
Me: 🤦‍♂️ #DeveloperHumor #CodingLife

profile.name: Kent C. Dodds
profile.headline: Founder & CEO at EpicWeb.dev | Dev Educator & Consultant | React & AI Expert | Microsoft MVP | Empowering Developers Worldwide
profile.about: I am passionate about improving the world through high-quality software, empowering developers with the knowledge and tools they need to build exceptional web applications. As the founder of EpicWeb.dev and EpicReact.dev, I dedicate myself to creating comprehensive educational content focusing on modern web development, React, and emerging AI applications. My goal is to foster growth and excellence within the developer community, guiding them towards more robust, scalable, and delightful user experiences.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description:
Led the development of AI-driven features for web applications, integrating large language models (LLMs) and machine learning APIs into user-facing React applications.
Architected and implemented scalable frontend solutions using React, TypeScript, and modern state management patterns to support complex AI workflows.
Collaborated closely with product, design, and AI research teams to translate innovative concepts into robust, production-ready systems.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description:
Developed and maintained core features for a high-traffic SaaS platform, focusing on user experience and performance using React, Node.js, and AWS services.
Optimized application performance and user experience, leading to a 15% reduction in page load times and improved user engagement metrics.
Participated in agile development cycles, contributing to code reviews, system design discussions, and mentoring junior team members.

experience.title: Junior Software Developer
experience.description:
Implemented frontend components and user interfaces for various client projects using React and other modern web technologies.
Assisted in migrating legacy systems to modern React-based architectures, improving maintainability and scalability.
Collaborated with senior developers on debugging, testing, and deploying features across multiple applications.

education.activities: Dean's List (6 semesters), ACM Programming Team, Undergraduate Teaching Assistant (Data Structures)

posts.content:
Your personal brand as a developer isn't just about getting a job; it's about establishing your expertise, building a network, and creating opportunities.

Start small: contribute to open source, write a blog post about a problem you solved, or share insights on LinkedIn (like this!). Consistency and authenticity are key. People want to connect with real humans who are passionate about their craft.

What's one thing you've done recently to build your personal brand?

#PersonalBranding #DeveloperCareer #Networking #OpenSource #TechTips

Developer burnout is a real challenge, and it's often exacerbated by the constant pressure to 'do more.' I'm a firm believer in working smarter, not just harder.

Lately, I've been experimenting with AI-powered code assistants more deeply than ever before, not for writing full features, but for mundane tasks like generating boilerplate, writing tests, or refactoring suggestions. The time saved is substantial, freeing up mental bandwidth for complex problem-solving and creative design.

What tools or strategies are helping you optimize your workflow and prevent burnout?

#DeveloperProductivity #AItools #WorkLifeBalance #TechWellness #SoftwareDevelopment

Huge shoutout to Sarah T. (a fantastic EpicWeb.dev community member) for crushing her recent interview and landing a Senior Frontend Developer role! She shared how the patterns and strategies from our 'Testing React Apps' module gave her the confidence and expertise to ace the technical round.

Seeing our community members succeed is truly the most rewarding part of running EpicWeb.dev. Keep inspiring, Sarah! 💪

#DeveloperSuccess #CommunityWins #EpicWebDev #ReactDeveloper #CareerGrowth

Thrilled and honored to announce my renewal as a Microsoft MVP for another year! 🎉

This recognition means the world to me. It's a testament to the incredible community we're building around #React, #AI, and empowering developers worldwide through EpicWeb.dev.

Thank you to Microsoft for this continued support, and a massive thank you to everyone who engages with my content, courses, and consultancies. Your curiosity and drive inspire me every day. Let's keep pushing the boundaries of what's possible in web development!

#MicrosoftMVP #DeveloperCommunity #EpicWebDev #ReactJS #AIforDevs

Just read an excellent deep-dive into #React's new useFormState hook RFC. This is exactly the kind of innovation that keeps the React ecosystem fresh and powerful.

While still an RFC, the push towards better server component integration and streamlined form handling is a game-changer for many common patterns. I particularly appreciate the focus on error handling and revalidation built right in.

Article link: [Imagine a link to a React blog post or RFC here]

What are your initial thoughts? Are you excited about what this could mean for your server-side React development?

#ReactJS #FrontendDev #WebDev #StateManagement #DeveloperInsights

Excited to announce I'll be speaking at the upcoming Global Dev Summit! My session will be on 'Building Resilient AI-Powered UIs with React and Edge Functions.'

We'll cover practical approaches to designing performant, scalable, and fault-tolerant user interfaces that leverage the power of AI at the edge. Expect live coding, architectural insights, and actionable takeaways.

Hope to see many of you there! Details and registration: [Link to conference or webinar registration]

#SpeakingEngagement #ReactJS #AIforDevs #EdgeComputing #GlobalDevSummit

The conversation around #AIEthics in software development is becoming increasingly critical. We, as developers, are on the front lines of building these systems, and our choices have significant societal implications.

This article highlights the importance of 'explainability' and 'fairness' in AI models, especially when integrated into user-facing applications. It's not just about accuracy; it's about trust and responsible innovation.

Link: [Imagine an article on AI ethics here]

How are you incorporating ethical considerations into your AI-powered projects?

#ArtificialIntelligence #ResponsibleAI #DeveloperResponsibility #TechEthics #MachineLearning

Big news from EpicWeb.dev! 🎉

We've just rolled out a major update to our 'Advanced React Patterns' course, incorporating the latest best practices for React 19 (where applicable, focusing on stable features and forward-looking concepts) and a brand new module on integrating server-side logic efficiently.

Our mission at EpicWeb.dev has always been to empower developers with practical, cutting-edge knowledge. This update is a direct response to community feedback and the rapidly evolving React landscape. Dive in and elevate your skills!

Check out the updated course here: [Link to EpicWeb.dev course]

#EpicWebDev #ReactJS #DeveloperEducation #WebDevelopment #CourseLaunch

The synergy between #React and #AI is evolving faster than ever. We're moving beyond simple integrations to truly intelligent user experiences.

My take? Developers who understand how to orchestrate AI models (both client-side via WebAssembly/on-device and server-side via APIs) within a robust React architecture will be indispensable. Think about personalized content delivery, intelligent forms, or even AI-driven component generation.

It's not just about using an AI API; it's about designing systems where AI enhances the user journey seamlessly. What are your favorite emerging patterns for AI in React apps?

#WebDevelopment #ReactJS #ArtificialIntelligence #FrontendDevelopment #DeveloperSkills

In our fast-paced tech world, 'staying relevant' isn't just a buzzword – it's crucial for career longevity. For developers, this means more than just learning the next hot framework.

It's about understanding fundamental principles, developing strong problem-solving skills, and, critically, cultivating a growth mindset. Spend 15-30 minutes each day on deliberate learning: read an article, watch a tutorial, experiment with a new concept. Consistency beats intensity every time.

What's your go-to strategy for continuous learning?

#CareerAdvice #DeveloperLife #LifelongLearning #TechSkills #WebDevelopment

Big moves at EpicWeb.dev! We're expanding our team and looking for a passionate Senior Content Developer to help us create even more impactful learning experiences for the global dev community.

If you live and breathe #React, love teaching, and have a knack for explaining complex concepts clearly, we want to hear from you. This is an opportunity to directly shape the skills of thousands of developers worldwide.

Learn more and apply here: [Link to EpicWeb.dev careers page]

#Hiring #DeveloperJobs #EpicWebDev #ReactDeveloper #ContentCreator

Just wrapped up a deeply rewarding consulting engagement helping a rapidly scaling startup re-architect their core #React application for improved performance and maintainability.

The biggest lesson learned (again!): early investment in a robust, testable architecture pays dividends exponentially as complexity grows. Tackling technical debt proactively isn't just good practice; it's a strategic business advantage.

Proud of the team's dedication and the immediate impact we've seen. On to the next challenge! #Consulting #WebDev #SoftwareArchitecture #ReactJS #Performance

What's the single most significant paradigm shift you anticipate in web development over the next 5 years?

My bet is on even deeper integration of AI throughout the entire development lifecycle, from code generation and testing to intelligent deployment and monitoring. This, coupled with advancements in WASM and edge computing, will redefine 'full-stack' as we know it.

Will it simplify things, or introduce new complexities? I'm eager to hear your predictions!

#FutureOfTech #WebDevelopment #AI #WASM #DeveloperDebate
